title: Inquilus
description: A Science-Fiction novel about a small International group brought together by a passive alien entity to combat the ultimate alien invasion force. These warlike aliens have manipulated the corrupt Carozzi, front-runner to be European Emperor and have powers that make them a formidable enemy, seemingly unstoppable.Any conflict with Carozzi will put them not only into conflict with Carozzi's security army and the aliens but also with the authorities. Led by the youngest and seemingly weakest member, can the group put aside their bristling self-absorbed differences quickly enough to thwart this evil and save the world?
author: Felicity Lennie
